subject: Re: Thank you for your recent application, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$368,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
